short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HyperTalk Content Sharing extension for Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HyperTalk Content Sharing Extension for Chrome enables the end-users to share content and applications among video collaboration sessions such as live events, web meetings or webinars, or education and training programmes.
